steps.title: InMemori book presentation
steps.subtitle: The InMemori book brings together all the messages and photos shared by your loved ones. Its layout is designed by the InMemori team.

steps.title: Choose your bouquet
steps.subtitle: All bouquets are medium in size and supplied with a water bubble so that they can be delivered to the place of the funeral of your choice.

labels.tip1: To collect money on the internet, the law requires the organizer to be identified and provide the following information
labels.beneficiary: Who is the Beneficiary of the funds?
labels.message: Your message to introduce the fundraising

family: The whole family wishes to pay tribute to {{capitalize firstname}} by organizing a fundraising.
For those who wish to contribute, we are organizing a fundraising in memory of {{capitalize firstname}}.
We are organizing a fundraising in memory of {{capitalize firstname}}. The amount raised will help our family finance the funeral. Many thanks for your generosity.
org:
{{capitalize firstname}} served others in the association {{org}}. 

We wish to continue this fight in his/her memory and organize a fundraising to support this association which was so dear to him/her. We believe this is what {{capitalize firstname}} would have liked. Thank you so much for your generosity.

As you know, {{capitalize firstname}} has lost the battle to his/her illness after years of fighting. In memory of {{capitalize firstname}} and all the other victims of this disease, we have decided to support the {{org}} association to fund research and save thousands of future lives. Thank you for supporting this cause which is particularly close to our hearts.

{{Capitalize firstname}} has always been committed to helping others and was involved in the association {{org}} which particularly touched him/her. Let's support this association in his/her honor. Many thanks for your generosity.

edit-profile.title: Information relating to your loved one

ph.lastname: Last name of your loved one

edit-intro.title: Notice of passing

label.intro: Write a message to let your friends and family know of the passing of your loved one.

templates:
Dear family, dear friends,
We are very sad to announce the death of {{{firstname}}} {{# if dod}} which occurred last {{dod}} {{/ if}} {{# if age}} at the age of {{age}} years {{/ if}}. 

This InMemori page is intended to collect your testimonies: a message, a memory or a photo, illustrating a moment you shared with {{firstname}}.

The information about the funeral is shown below. Thank you for your support.
It is with a heavy heart that we share the passing of {{fullname}} {{# if dod}}, which occurred on {{dod}} {{/ if}}.

This space is intended for the family and all those who knew and loved {{fullname}} {{# if dod}}, who died last {{dod}} {{/ if}}. {{firstname}} will remain in our hearts forever. 

Do not hesitate to leave a message, a memory or a photo on this space. Sincerely.

menu.title: Thanks for your words !
menu.subtitle: Vos condoléances seront visibles par tous ceux qui ont accès à cet espace.

menu.title: Condolences
menu.subtitle: Express your feelings of support with {{firstname}}'s family.

menu.title: Photos
menu.subtitle: The space becomes prettier with pictures.

card-ft-book.title: The book
card-ft-book.text: Keep a physical trace of all the messages shared on InMemori

card-ft-flower.title: Flowers
card-ft-flower.text: Send flowers to the funeral place

card-ft-donation-unset.title: Activate a fundraising
card-ft-donation-unset.text: Support a cause that was dear to {{firstname}} in three clicks.

message.email:
Hello,

It is with great sadness that we announce the death of {{fullname}}. 

We share with you this private InMemori space on the internet to pay tribute to their life. By going to the space you can:

- Consult the information about the funeral 
- Share a condolence, a memory, a photo 

We appreciate your messages of support during these difficult times. 

Do not hesitate to share this space with all the people touched by {{fullname}}'s life.

labels.sms-intro: Share the page from your mobile. We’ll send you the link by SMS, and you can share it with your contacts.

tab-infos.promo: The funeral is being organized by {{{name}}}.{{#if phone}} {{phone}}{{/if}}

delete.text: Delete the page in honor of {{capitalize firstname}}

managers.message:
Hello,

I added you as administrator of the InMemori space in tribute to {{firstname}} so that you can help me personalize and manage it. 

Geraldine from InMemori is at our disposal for any questions and can be reached at (617) 858 4572 or by email at contact@inmemori.com.
